title: Conference Finals Preview, NBA Lottery
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN’s Kevin Pelton and Marc J. Spears to react to the Mavs dismantling the Suns, Luka making a statement, the future in Phoenix, Boston closing out the Bucks despite a massive series from Giannis and what to expect from the NBA Lottery. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, NBA, Brian Windhorst
itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: Mavs Dismantle The Suns, Celtics Step Up Against The Bucks
